A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a 30 year Star Wars fan\, this was the worse movie yet. The Star Wars Universe is one that fans and Mr Lucas have worked very hard to establish. it’s really sad that the writers of this film decided to crap all over it. Thank you Disney Company and Rian Johnson for taking something loved by millions and turning it into garbage. It’s clear Mr Johnson that you really don’t care about the fans.
